sportCyclingList.name: Schwinn Urban Bike 3
sportCyclingList.description: A wonderful hybrid bike from Schwinn! Just in need of parts, labor, and some tuning. Great for a mountain bike transformation as well. Then you'll be able to provide yourself with an environmentally friendly transportation to school, work, or wherever in this bicycle today! Get out riding with this beautiful vintage Schwinn Frontier Hybrid bike!

sportCyclingList.desciption: Klien Road Bike 700c large frame prototype possible campagnolo groupset. Fully refurbished new axel new tires new bar tap all serviced well trued please be advised if ship it will be partially disassembled and its gonna be expensive

sportCyclingList.name: Hurley Kickflip Beach Cruiser Bike
sportCyclingList.desciption: Hurleys basic beach cruiser, electrified! Get the best of both worlds with the Kickflip: comfortable, laid back, relaxed, single speed, beach-style riding with extra oomph from the 250 watt, 36 volt ride assist and throttle to get you from point A to point B, effortlessly.
sportCyclingList.img: img/sp01003_Hurley Kickflip Beach Cruiser Single Speed E-Bike-1.jpg

sportCyclingList.name: Comaxsun Photochromic Cycling Glasses
sportCyclingList.desciption: Color change time: winter for 1 minute , summer for 40 seconds. Speed depends on sunlight and UV intensity! The rate of discoloration is related to the intensity of ultraviolet light and the temperature.(if UV intensity and temperature is low, The speed of discoloration will become slower).
sportCyclingList.img: img/sp01004_Comaxsun Photochromic Cycling Glasses Discoloration Bike Goggles Sports Eyewear-1.jpg

sportWaterList.name: U.S. Divers Womens SM Snorkel Combo Set Diva 2 LX Premium Max Silicone Materials
sportWaterList.desciption: The Diva LX Set is designed just for women. sportWaterList.desciption: The diving headlight has 3 switching modes: high /medium /strobe. The light head with the stainless steel case can be rotated 90 degrees.

sportWaterList.desciption: This is a great board for 5'5 Mom and 5'8 16 year old daughter. Lightweight, flawless. Binding system is so easy to get in and out of. Shipped promptly, arrived intact.
